short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically clicks the confirm button when a day is selected in the Jira calendar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the new Jira update, now the user needs to always click "Confirm" button when entering a date, leading to frustration and incorrect date submissions.

This extension fixes this workflow, by making the calendar the automatically confirm the date when the day is pressed.
